refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Properties
refsect1.synopsis: "alpha" guint : Read / Write "blue" guint : Read / Write "dither" gboolean : Read / Write "green" guint : Read / Write "red" guint : Read / Write "title" gchararray : Read / Write "use-alpha" gboolean : Read / Write

refsect1.title: Signal Prototypes
refsect1.synopsis: "color-set" void user_function (GnomeColorPicker *colorpicker, guint arg1, guint arg2, guint arg3, guint arg4, gpointer user_data);

warning.para: GnomeColorPicker is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_new ()

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a new GNOME color picker widget. This returns a widget in the form of a small button containing a swatch representing the current selected color. When the button is clicked, a color-selection dialog will open, allowing the user to select a color. The swatch will be updated to reflect the new color when the user finishes.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to new GNOME color picker widget.

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_set_d ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_color_picker_set_d (GnomeColorPicker *cp, gdouble r, gdouble g, gdouble b, gdouble a);

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_set_d is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set color shown in the color picker widget using floating point values.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
Red color component, values are in [0.0, 1.0]
Green color component, values are in [0.0, 1.0]
Blue color component, values are in [0.0, 1.0]
Alpha component, values are in [0.0, 1.0]

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_get_d ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_color_picker_get_d (GnomeColorPicker *cp, gdouble *r, gdouble *g, gdouble *b, gdouble *a);

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_get_d is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Retrieve color currently selected in the color picker widget in the form of floating point values.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
Output location of red color component, values are in [0.0, 1.0]
Output location of green color component, values are in [0.0, 1.0]
Output location of blue color component, values are in [0.0, 1.0]
Output location of alpha color component, values are in [0.0, 1.0]

refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_color_picker_set_i8 (GnomeColorPicker *cp, guint8 r, guint8 g, guint8 b, guint8 a);

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_set_i8 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set color shown in the color picker widget using 8-bit integer values.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
Red color component, values are in [0, 255]
Green color component, values are in [0, 255]
Blue color component, values are in [0, 255]
Alpha component, values are in [0, 255]

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_get_i8 ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_color_picker_get_i8 (GnomeColorPicker *cp, guint8 *r, guint8 *g, guint8 *b, guint8 *a);

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_get_i8 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Retrieve color currently selected in the color picker widget in the form of 8-bit integer values.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
Output location of red color component, values are in [0, 255]
Output location of green color component, values are in [0, 255]
Output location of blue color component, values are in [0, 255]
Output location of alpha color component, values are in [0, 255]

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_set_i16 ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_color_picker_set_i16 (GnomeColorPicker *cp, gushort r, gushort g, gushort b, gushort a);

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_set_i16 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set color shown in the color picker widget using 16-bit integer values.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
Red color component, values are in [0, 65535]
Green color component, values are in [0, 65535]
Blue color component, values are in [0, 65535]
Alpha component, values are in [0, 65535]

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_get_i16 ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_color_picker_get_i16 (GnomeColorPicker *cp, gushort *r, gushort *g, gushort *b, gushort *a);

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_get_i16 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Retrieve color currently selected in the color picker widget in the form of 16-bit integer values.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
Output location of red color component, values are in [0, 65535]
Output location of green color component, values are in [0, 65535]
Output location of blue color component, values are in [0, 65535]
Output location of alpha color component, values are in [0, 65535]

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_set_dither ()

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_set_dither is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets whether the picker should dither the color sample or just paint a solid rectangle.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
TRUE if color sample should be dithered, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_get_dither ()

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_get_dither is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Does the picker dither the color sample or just paint a solid rectangle.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
TRUE if color sample is dithered, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_set_use_alpha ()

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_set_use_alpha is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets whether or not the picker should use the alpha channel.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
TRUE if color sample should use alpha channel, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_get_use_alpha ()

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_get_use_alpha is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Does the picker use the alpha channel?

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
TRUE if color sample uses alpha channel, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_set_title ()

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_set_title is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the title for the color selection dialog.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
String containing new window title.

refsect2.title: gnome_color_picker_get_title ()

warning.para: gnome_color_picker_get_title is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the title of the color selection dialog.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to GNOME color picker widget.
An internal string, do not free the return value

refsect2.title: The "alpha" property
refsect2.para: The alpha value of the chosen color.
Allowed values: <= 255
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "blue" property
refsect2.para: The amount of blue in the chosen color.
Allowed values: <= 255
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "dither" property
refsect2.para: Whether or not to dither to color.
Default value: TRUE

refsect2.title: The "green" property
refsect2.para: The amount of green in the chosen color.
Allowed values: <= 255
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "red" property
refsect2.para: The amount of red in the chosen color.
Allowed values: <= 255
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "title" property
refsect2.para: The title to give to the color picker.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "use-alpha" property
refsect2.para: Whether or not to give the color an alpha value.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "color-set" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (GnomeColorPicker *colorpicker, guint arg1, guint arg2, guint arg3, guint arg4, gpointer user_data);

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
